description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named UserController for managing user profiles in a web application. It provides endpoints to view, update, and delete the authenticated user's profile, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and structure.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: REST controller for user profile management, handling profile viewing, updating, and deletion for authenticated users.

methods.name: getUserProfile
methods.description: Retrieves the profile information of the currently authenticated user.

methods.name: updateUserProfile
methods.description: Updates the profile of the currently authenticated user with provided details.

methods.name: deleteUser
methods.description: Deletes the account of the currently authenticated user.
